name: The Pirate' Diary
description:
You decided to become a pirate, but all pirates need a team. You decided to go to the captain and ask him to take you on the team, but it's not that simple...

I recommend playing in full screen mode.

Controls:

Moving - w a s d

Read - e

Attack - left mouse button

Go back to the menu - esc(double tap)

open/close map - m
